onClickPlayerDiningRoom(Event) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.scenecontrollers.GameBoardSceneController
Moves a student previously selected to the proper table when the dining hall is clicked (it doesn't matter if a player clicks on the wrong table: since it's the whole dining room that is clickable and not the single tables, the controller will do the work for the player and place the student correctly).
onClickPlayerHall(Event) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.scenecontrollers.GameBoardSceneController
Allows the movement of a student when clicked on the player's hall.
